column6: You guys understand this is NOT A SECRET WARS TIE-IN, right? It's nothing less than the TRUTH that THEY DON'T WANT YOU TO KNOW! THIS is how the ORIGINAL SECRET WARS really ended! YOU WILL NOT BELIEVE IT! Which is your right.
column8: | writer:Cullen Bunn | penciller (cover):Tony Harris | penciller:Matteo Lolli | editor:Jordan White
